decision_conditions:
<div>Officers consider the proposal by means of design and scale to be&nbsp;unacceptable. The proposal fails to reflect the built form of the host property, the distinct repetitive terraces and the design and character of the host dwelling. The proposal would cause harm to visual amenity and the balance and symmetry of the street scene due to its prominent position at the end-of-terrace.&nbsp;The flat roof design generates further harm as it will cause a loss in the balance of the terraces built form and roofscape.
